title: Michael Bay Covid 19 Movie Incoming! Senator Rat F*** 11.18.20
itunes:title: Michael Bay Covid 19 Movie Incoming! Senator Rat F*** 11.18.20
description:
In episode 762, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Brodie Reed to discuss more fight clubs, more Republicans trying to screw this election over, Trump trying to bomb Iran on the way out, Biden ignoring Trump investigations, Michael Bay's pandemic thriller, the Parler app, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. So-called 'fight club' at McGill University really happened, and students say COVID life is to blame
  2. Ga. secretary of state says fellow Republicans are pressuring him to find ways to exclude ballots
  3. Guess Who's Coming To A Courtroom In Pennsylvania To F*ck Sh*t Up!
  4. Trump Sought Options for Attacking Iran to Stop Its Growing Nuclear Program
  5. Biden hopes to avoid divisive Trump investigations, preferring unity
  6. Michael Bay's COVID-19 thriller Songbird lands premium VOD release date
  7. WATCH: SONGBIRD Trailer (2021)
  8. Michael Bay pandemic movie trailer criticized as 'exploitation cinema'
  9. Twitter Is *So* Not Here For KJ Apa’s Coronavirus-Inspired Film Songbird
  10. Michael Bay's COVID-19 thriller Songbird lands premium VOD release date
  11. Director reveals safety measures for Michael Bay-produced pandemic thriller 'Songbird'
  12. Lights, Camera … COVID! The Perils of Shooting Amid a Pandemic
  13. False claims of voting fraud, pushed by Trump, thrive online
  14. Social app Parler apparently receives funding from the conservative Mercer family
  15. What Does the Billionaire Family Backing Donald Trump Really Want?
  16. ‘I made Steve Bannon’s psychological warfare tool’: meet the data war whistleblower
  17. The Right’s New Favorite Social Media Platform Parler Is Just as Restrictive as Twitter
  18. Conservatives are flocking to a new 'free speech' social media app that has started banning liberal users
  19. Arkansas police chief resigns after threatening to abuse Democrats
  20. WATCH: SLD (Quiet Storm Hour) - E. Jones

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
